geomason

Class CostTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • geomason.CostTile

  • public class CostTile
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Norman Langner This class represents the additional costs for each tile which form the dynamic floor field

    • Constructor Summary

      CostTile(int x, int y, int costs)
